Home.intro:
Every photo tells a story. I capture real moments in a creative, artistic way.

I create images that go beyond the ordinary: every image is a work of art, carefully composed to capture the atmosphere, emotion and story of your day. Between reality and imagination, I capture moments as they truly are – intimate, pure and timeless.

projects.title: Wedding J&A
projects.description: J & A's wedding at the bride's parental home was an intimate day full of warmth, laughter and genuine connection. Surrounded by their dearest people, it was clear from the very first moment that this was not just a wedding, but a celebration of love — for each other and for their families — and of the small moments that make a day unforgettable.

projects.title: Morning Light in Friesland
projects.description: A family of five, boots on, playing and cuddling in the early morning. Small moments, big adventures — pure, spontaneous and captured with love.

projects.title: Her Energy
projects.description:
Personal branding with Tess

In the light, creative atmosphere of Studio Ventidue, Tess came fully into her own. Everything was allowed to be there. Together we captured her energy, style and personality — in a creative, authentic way.

projects.title: Parisian Love Story
projects.description:
Laughing, cuddling and walking through Paris together.

A day full of intimate moments and the magic of A&S's love, captured timelessly and purely.

projects.title: Waiting For You
projects.description: In the soft light of NJ Space Amsterdam, T&A radiated nothing but love and happiness. So special to be able to capture this for my brother and sister-in-law — you are beautiful

projects.title: Natural Glow
projects.description: A beautiful day in nature, where everything was allowed to be. Real, pure and in connection with the environment, we captured S's energy and essence.

projects.title: Wedding J&T
projects.description: A beautiful day at Restaurant Dorset, full of love, laughter and genuine moments. J&T surrounded by their dearest people — a day never to forget.

projects.title: Moments That Last
projects.description: Running through the dunes, jumping, laughing and enjoying being together — an evening full of fun and moments that are pure, spontaneous and timeless. So special to be able to make these beautiful images with your day 1 friends, who are always close to you and with whom you share so many memories.

projects.title: DE BRASS
projects.description: Moments full of character, energy and atmosphere. Spontaneous, real and timeless captured — images that tell the story of DE BRASS.

About.label: About the Artist
About.intro1: That's me – the face behind Loes Nooitgedagt Photography.
About.intro2: As a photographer, I capture stories: stories of emotion, connection and the unexpected. My work revolves around moments as they truly are, with all their nuance and beauty. With every photo shoot, I strive for a relaxed, natural atmosphere, because it is precisely that calm that is the key to images that radiate purity and authenticity. Whether it's a wedding, lifestyle or brand shoot, my goal is always the same: to capture the essence of the moment, in a timeless and authentic way.

philosophy.label: Philosophy
philosophy.title: Preserving a feeling
philosophy.text1: What sets my work apart is my eye for detail and the personal approach I bring. Every wedding, every shoot is unique, and I capture those moments with attention, precision and an artistic eye. For me, photography is much more than capturing an image: it's about preserving a feeling, a memory that continues to live. For me, it's not just about the end result, but about the experience from start to finish – a process in which you feel free and relaxed, so that the images capture exactly what is dear to you: pure, timeless and sincere.
philosophy.text2:
Stories of emotion and connection

That's me – the face behind Loes Nooitgedagt Photography.

As a photographer, I capture stories: stories of emotion, connection and the unexpected. My work revolves around moments as they truly are, with all their nuance and beauty. With every photo shoot, I strive for a relaxed, natural atmosphere, because it is precisely that calm that is the key to images that radiate purity and authenticity. Whether it's a wedding, lifestyle or brand shoot, my goal is always the same: to capture the essence of the moment, in a timeless and authentic way.

hero.title: Invest in
hero.description: Photography is more than images—it's an investment in moments you'll treasure forever. Each package is thoughtfully designed to meet your unique needs and tell your story with authenticity.

packages.label: Packages
packages.title: Find your
packages.description: Whether it's a lifestyle session, brand shoot, or your wedding day, I offer tailored packages designed to capture your unique story.

items.title: Lifestyle
items.subtitle: Capturing everyday beauty
items.description: Perfect for personal portraits, family moments, and lifestyle content that tells your unique story.

items.title: Brand
items.subtitle: Visual identity for businesses
items.description: Elevate your brand with professional imagery that captures your essence and connects with your audience.

items.title: Wedding
items.subtitle: Your love story, preserved
items.description: From intimate ceremonies to grand celebrations, every precious moment documented with artistry and heart.

items.title: Portrait
items.subtitle: The art of you
items.description: Bespoke portrait sessions tailored to your vision. Fine art, editorial, or personal—crafted just for you.

items.title: Event
items.subtitle: Moments that matter
items.description: Corporate events, celebrations, and gatherings captured with discretion and an eye for authentic moments.

items.q: How do I book a session?
items.a: Simply reach out via the contact form or email. We'll discuss your vision, preferred dates, and package options to find the perfect fit.

items.q: When will I receive my images?
items.a: Edited images are typically delivered within 2-3 weeks for lifestyle and portrait sessions, and 4-6 weeks for weddings. Rush delivery available upon request.

items.q: Can I request specific shots or poses?
items.a: Absolutely! I encourage you to share inspiration and ideas. While I guide the session naturally, your input helps me capture exactly what you envision.

wedding.label: Portfolio — Wedding
wedding.title: I capture real moments in a creative,
wedding.titleItalic: artistic way. Every photo is a work of art – never ordinary.
wedding.description: No two weddings are the same, and that's what makes my work so special. I move with the rhythm of your day: sometimes unobtrusively in the background, at other times subtly present to capture the perfect moment. With an eye for atmosphere and emotion, I capture your day as it truly was – pure, timeless and sincere.

cta.label: Your Day
cta.title: Let's capture
cta.description: Every wedding is unique. Let's create a custom package that perfectly captures your special day, from getting ready to the last dance.

lifestyle.label: Portfolio — Lifestyle
lifestyle.title: Real life,
lifestyle.description: I capture the beauty of everyday moments, family connections and personal rituals in an authentic, editorial way. Spontaneous, timeless and full of emotion – images that tell the story of your life as it truly is.

cta.label: Your Story
cta.title: Let's create
cta.description: Whether it's personal branding, family memories, or content creation, let's craft images that feel true to you.

brand.label: Portfolio — Brand
brand.title: I capture brands and stories in a creative,
brand.description:
Every photo is carefully created to capture the essence, style and identity of your brand – unique, powerful and timeless.

Together we transform vision, atmosphere and authenticity into images that speak, connect and make an impression.

cta.label: Your Brand
cta.title: Let's build
cta.description: From personal brands to established businesses, I'll help you create imagery that truly represents who you are and what you stand for.

portrait.label: Portfolio — Portrait
portrait.title: You,
portrait.description: Portrait photography as fine art. Each session is a collaboration, creating images that reveal your essence and tell your story with depth, beauty, and intention.

cta.label: Your Portrait
cta.title: Let's create
cta.description: Whether for editorial, fine art, or personal reasons, let's craft portraits that are as unique and meaningful as you are.

event.label: Portfolio — Event
event.title: Moments,
event.description: Event photography with a documentary approach. From corporate gatherings to intimate celebrations, I capture the energy, emotion, and authentic moments that make your event memorable.

cta.label: Your Event
cta.title: Let's document
cta.description: Whether it's a corporate event, milestone celebration, or special gathering, I'll capture every important moment with professionalism and care.
